name: Alpas
headline: Software for procurement departments to find suppliers 10x faster
description: Alpas provides data-driven sourcing for procurement departments of mid and large-cap manufacturing companies. We use ML methods to provide 360° views of suppliers and supply chains, benchmark suppliers globally and assess geopolitical as well as supplier-specific risks.

founders.name: Isabel Poppek, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO of Alpas. Started Alpas with 27 after years of work experience in startups, industry & private equity; degree in mechanical engineering & finance from TU Munich/ Max Planck Institute. I my free time, I love running marathons, skiing or horseback riding. Passionate about building products that have an impact on the environment.

founders.name: Nils Vollmer, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Alpas. M.Sc. computer science, former EXIST co-founder, 7yrs exp. in tech startups. Passionate about figuring out & building great software products and having an impact (not limited to monetary).

# Sourcing means Power
Sourcing automation has never been this fast 
![Procurement Summit Startup Award](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/themes/alpas/assets/img/ribbon.svg)

![Find your suppliers 10x faster](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Frame-1362.png)
### Find your suppliers 10x faster
Our AI-driven supplier search enables our customers to scout and benchmark suppliers globally. Based on their needs, we can take as many technical and commercial search parameters into account as required.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
![Save up to 57% on procurement spend](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Frame-1363.png)
### Save up to 57% on procurement spend
Alpas simplifies and accelerates the procurement process by identifying previously unknown and more cost-effective suppliers. Thus, strengthen your negotiation position and reduce procurement spend with Alpas.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
![Experience the power of a 360° supplier view ](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Frame-1364.png)
### Experience the power of a 360° supplier view 
Alpas revolutionizes transparency in procurement with its 360° supplier view. This data-driven approach provides instant insights into supplier performance, compliance, and risks. The result is a more efficient, resilient, and trustworthy supply chain.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
[Read more](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1547740077.jpg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/LandisGyrTest.svg)
> "L+G have used the Alpas supplier search solution in various geographies with always the same result: the Alpas tool yields significantly more potential suppliers, and in much less time than any of our internal searches."
Global Strategic Sourcing Manager, Landis+Gyr Group AG
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Alpas-Brose-Building.jpg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/alpas-brose_sven-uwe_erber_bild_.jpg)
> "Do you already use Alpas or are you still scouting? Alpas has completely overhauled our supplier scouting: instead of "Google" and time-consuming searches, the AI of Alpas does the job - quickly, reliably and, above all, with unprecedented quality. In addition to the commodity strategies, the local-for-local activities (supply chain de-risk) benefit in particular."
Sven-Uwe Erber, Chief Procurement Officer, Brose Group
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/Enbw_background-2.jpeg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/b302443ae591f76769e4cdbf7eade025.jpeg)
> "Thanks to Alpas AI, we can find new suppliers more quickly and save valuable time. The platform has opened up unknown suppliers for us, minimizing our risks and improving security of supply. Alpas AI provides us with insights into the market that accurately complement our strategic decisions. Companies looking for efficiency and transparency in procurement, Alpas AI is an excellent choice."
Jürgen Schuster, Capability Owner Category Management, EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/hauptsitz-sbb-bern-1.jpg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/SBBtest2.svg)
> "Alpas E-Sourcing has identified new, competent suppliers for a wide range of product types without using internal resources. Depending on the sourcing event, we save several days of market research by the buyer."
Strategic Buyer, Production Passenger Transport, Swiss Federal Railways AG
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1547740077.jpg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/LandisGyrTest.svg)
> "L+G have used the Alpas supplier search solution in various geographies with always the same result: the Alpas tool yields significantly more potential suppliers, and in much less time than any of our internal searches."
Global Strategic Sourcing Manager, Landis+Gyr Group AG
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Alpas-Brose-Building.jpg)
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/alpas-brose_sven-uwe_erber_bild_.jpg)
> "Do you already use Alpas or are you still scouting? Alpas has completely overhauled our supplier scouting: instead of "Google" and time-consuming searches, the AI of Alpas does the job - quickly, reliably and, above all, with unprecedented quality. In addition to the commodity strategies, the local-for-local activities (supply chain de-risk) benefit in particular."
Sven-Uwe Erber, Chief Procurement Officer, Brose Group

## We are the right partner in every situation
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/scott-graham-5fNmWej4tAA-unsplash-scaled-e1709031180907.jpg)
### Supply Chain Management
When you are busy managing current supply chain shortages, we gather and monitor relevant supplier data for you
![](https://alpas.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/christian-lue-C241mbgtgys-unsplash-scaled-e1709035850768.jpg)
### Geopolitical tensions 
As you prepare for political frictions, we help you to reduce the risk on your supply chains

![Find your suppliers 10x faster⟨10⟩]
### Find your suppliers 10x faster
Our AI-driven supplier search enables our customers to scout and benchmark suppliers globally. Based on their needs, we can take as many technical and commercial search parameters into account as required.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
![Save up to 57% on procurement spend⟨11⟩]
### Save up to 57% on procurement spend
Alpas simplifies and accelerates the procurement process by identifying previously unknown and more cost-effective suppliers. Thus, strengthen your negotiation position and reduce procurement spend with Alpas.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)
![Experience the power of a 360° supplier view ⟨12⟩]
### Experience the power of a 360° supplier view 
Alpas revolutionizes transparency in procurement with its 360° supplier view. This data-driven approach provides instant insights into supplier performance, compliance, and risks. The result is a more efficient, resilient, and trustworthy supply chain.
[](https://alpas.ai/</product/>)

generated_description:
### Alpas: Revolutionizing Procurement with AI

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s W21 batch, Alpas has carved out a niche in the procurement software space, particularly targeting mid and large-cap manufacturing companies. Headquartered in Berlin, Germany, this five-person startup is on a mission: to help procurement departments find suppliers **10x faster**.

#### What Sets Alpas Apart?

Alpas employs machine learning methods to deliver a comprehensive, 360° view of suppliers and supply chains. This means not only can procurement professionals assess potential suppliers more efficiently, but they can also benchmark suppliers globally, and analyze geopolitical as well as supplier-specific risks. 

In a world where supply chain disruptions have become the norm, Alpas stands out by enabling its users to **identify previously unknown suppliers**, leading to potential savings of up to **57% on procurement spends**. Their AI-driven platform allows for detailed technical and commercial searches tailored to specific needs—something traditional search methods can’t compete with.

The platform appeals particularly to companies seeking enhanced efficiency and transparency in their supply chains, offering insights into supplier performance, compliance, and risks.

#### Key Features and Benefits

1. **Rapid Supplier Discovery**: Alpas helps businesses find suppliers that fit their specific requirements significantly faster than conventional methods.
   
2. **Cost Reduction**: By identifying new, cost-effective suppliers, Alpas empowers companies to negotiate better, thereby reducing overall procurement expenditures.

3. **360° Supplier View**: This feature ensures that procurement departments have instant access to critical supplier data, enhancing supply chain resilience and trustworthiness.

4. **Geopolitical Risk Management**: With geopolitical tensions affecting supply chains worldwide, Alpas assists customers in identifying and mitigating risks associated with their suppliers.

#### Company and Team Dynamics

With founders Isabel Poppek and Nils Vollmer at the helm, Alpas is not just a tech startup—it's a strategic partner for organizations looking to streamline their sourcing processes. Their dedication to innovation in procurement has gained recognition, including accolades at industry events.

### In the Spotlight

Their work hasn't gone unnoticed. Articles in prestigious outlets like WIRED and Forbes highlight Alpas as one of Berlin's hottest startups, reinforcing their innovative approach in a rapidly evolving field. 

If you're part of a procurement department looking to harness the power of AI-driven sourcing and take your supplier search to new heights, **[schedule a demo with Alpas](https://alpas.ai/#schedule-demo)** or dive into their solutions today! 

For more information, you can check them out at their official website: [Alpas.ai](https://alpas.ai).

Feel free to reach out or learn more about their solutions and join the future of efficient procurement!
